Description: Faded green glazed composition shabti of a woman named Bak(et)-ne(t)-Khons, with black(now purple) detail: a lappet-wig tied with a fillet, a modelled face with traced eyes and crossed hands in relief holding two hoes; Hieroglyphic text down the leg section; seed-basket on the back.
Curator's comments: The collection contains a second shabti of the same woman (EA 76745; name there given as Baketkhons).
